channel.title: state of my life address on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in state of my life address on Barefoot Rob

item.title: first state of my life address in 2013
item.description: ##10:17 Saturday 02 March 2013 I’ve misplaced my template for writing States of My Life Addresses. Work has been my main focus for a while; Mondays through Fridays I wake up usually at 7:30am, do a backup of the AB database, leave for work at 8; arrive at work at 9, eat my lunch that Lin made, work + read hacker news, buy a drink and snack around 4pm, leave at 6pm, meet Lin at Shinagawa station or at home, eat dinner, hang out, shower, sleep.

item.title: a few things in my brain at 4am
item.description: ##06:11 Wednesday 06 February 2013 It’s 4:17am as I start this entry; it was 30 minutes ago that I went back to bed after waking up to pee and note that it’s not snowing outside. Lin’s news sources said it would snow tomorrow. Her mom’s news sources said it would snow between 10 and 20 cm tomorrow. My weather app says it will rain tomorrow, and so far, my app is right.

item.title: quick state of my life jan 2013
item.description: ##07:58 Wednesday 16 January 2013 I just wrote this to my friend Laura Hi Laura!! You were in my dream last night! We were at a party; I think it was my birthday. Thanks for coming!! You were standing a bit away from the party fracas, so were the first person I saw when I came in. I was so happy to see you!! We kissed a little bit and then you were like, “okay, that’s enough, thunder buns” and then I woke up.

item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: ##00:37 Sunday 21 October 2012 I haven’t written a SoML in a while. Fred and Ma are coming to Japan in December!! Lin and I have been going to yoga class every Saturday morning at Yogasan. I’ve been working at sbstrm for going on 3 years now, not counting my Thailand adventure and chilling in Chigasaki. My long-running project at sbstrm is for AB, for whom Lin used to work.
